title: New free champion rotation: Ashe, Fizz, Hecarim and more!

replies.body: Lol the question is why is {{champion:17}} free

Hi, im not sure if riot can see this comment but im typing because i wanted to say that, could u please fix the "see more stats" button in the "league" box in profile cause right now in OCE i am unable to access it to see my stats and other friends stats so if u may could u fix this for OCE.

Thank you, Lhuka

Hi Lhuka, this isn't my area of expertise but the best people to help you out with your stats problem are support. They can be reached with a ticket here (top right) https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
